name: Artichoke Hand printed fabric by Yard
description:
This artichoke green 100% KONA cotton is light to medium weight , and has a very soft touch.
(also available for custom printing order)

I hand screen printed my ink spills in pink and anchors in metallic gold.


Price is by the yard (0.9144 meter)
45 inch wide (1.143 meter)
*sorry, no half yards
$10 off if you want all 5 yards.

All of my pattern images are 100% created by me. I either hand draw my patterns or digitally alter photographs or found objects. There is a story behind each image and if you would like to hear it, let me know. Or just enjoy the way they all came together in this original and one a kind piece, that will not be recreated or matched. I print only 5 yards or a piece, and then move on to the next 5 yards. I welcome custom orders if the color is just not quit right for you, or you want to mix it up with some of my other images (additional fee applied for custom orders of $5 a yard). 


My style of pattern printing is random and rhythmic , and with completely control. This leaves each creation completely unique and one of kind and still extremely clean.

I use water-dispersible, lead/heavy metal-free pigmented screen printing inks by Nazdar. Fabrics are machine washable and safe for dryer, but I always recommend cold water at gentle cycle and line dry, to prevent shrinking and prolong life of the fibers. You can always wash and dry fabric before you sew anything just to be safe.

Questions? Do not hesitate to email me karin [!at] betterthanjamnyc.com
